resources.string: Change system colors with various theme combinations
Customize elements to be displayed in power menu
Miscellaneous things to be checked here
Display negociated charger max current and voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Press on color below to apply
Allow to use Home button when device is ringing
Enable backlight with timeout only on button touch
Toggle to enable disable hw keys
Prevent interaction with navigation buttons while the screen is being touched
When the screen is off, long-pressing the volume keys will seek music tracks
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
Long press power button while the screen is off to turn on the flashlight
Wake up device if charger is plugged/unplugged.
Swipe three fingers to take screenshot
Enable advanced reboot options in powermenu
Show weather information on lockscreen and during doze
Setup icon pack and weather service
Enable notification panel header weather display
Note\u003a you can install new icon packs from play store by searching for \"Chronus icons\"
Condition icon pack is used in quick settings and lock screen
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
Show a brightness slider on bottom quick settings
Double tap on the lock screen to put the device to sleep
Double-tap status bar to put the device to sleep
Disable heads up notifications in these applications
Disable heads up from these applications
Lets see who all are there :)

ColtOS was started by me (Rakesh Batra), Nitin, Nikhil and Debojit in early 2017 and it was a small but an effective group also and we all were in learning stage that\'s why Colt as a name arrived means a Learner. To start with ColtOS was based on LOS but now we have moved to aosp base and now in ColtOS Team we still have a team with some new members also and is just like a family to me, i would still like to mention the name of each and every member in ColtOS Team, 1. Rakesh Batra 2. Nitinkumar Chobhe 3. Roger.T 4.Debojit Deb, 5. Vinoth, 6. Santosh (SuperdroidBond), 7. Mukesh, 8. Athul, 9. Nikhil, 10. Meet Gohil, 11. Saurabh Hooda and 12. Anupam D Moran, that\'s the wonderfull team we have!!
Block access to certain sensors for some apps to save battery.
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Change the default font of the lockscreen clock widget
Display 4G icon in signal icon instead LTE
Enable the ability to show and use the power menu dialog while on the lockscreen
Show the reboot option on the lockscreen
Show the advanced reboot option on the lockscreen
Show the screenshot option on the lockscreen
Show the torch option on the lockscreen
Show name of current city on left of image
Show current city temperature on right of image
Enable adjustment of max lockscreen notifications
Disable expanding quick settings on secure lock screens
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Always show Quick Settings on status bar pulldown
Hide Left-Right Shortcuts on secure lock screens
Swap back and recents hardware keys
Enable on-screen navigation bar and disable hardware buttons
config sb n qs battery mode
Always display battery percentage when charging
Enables Custom filter when powermenu is active
Set custom volume steps for sounds
Show a dialog when an application crashes
Unlock device with fingerprint after reboot or lockdown
Display an animation when the device is plugged in
Actions will be executed on screen off. On screen on the previous state will be restored.
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off
GPS based location service will be disabled on screen off
Mobile data will be disabled on screen off
Number of seconds to wait before performing actions after screen off
Number of seconds to wait before performing actions after screen on
Control how the device network should behave when the screen is off
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss
Blocking alarms have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.
Shut off pixels to reduce power consumption
Enable Smart Pixels when battery saver is enabled
Prevent burn-in by shifting pixels every
Enter device idle more frequently and wake up less
Restrict apps from running in the background
Enable Aggressive Battery automatically when using battery saver
Show a kill app button in the notification\'s longpress menu
Play a sound when battery reaches charge level
Enable to play a sound when the battery reaches the specified level when charging
Enter a custom label. Leave blank to use your network name
Show mobile type icon on top of the signal indicator
Light up the side edges of the screen on notification pulse
Set edge light color to the primary color of your wallpaper
For better visibility on bright images
Select a local or remote image
blurs darkened background behind quick settings
Show visualizer bars while playing music
Use a smooth lava lamp style color blend animation
Enable media cover art on the lockscreen
Allow legacy apps to use full screen
Applications need to be restarted after changes
Change the default font of the lockscreen date widget
Change the default font of the lockscreen owner info
Controls whether the navigation bar is displayed
Hide the lock icon on lockscreen
Set QS background color from Wallpaper
Disable custom QS styles for external theme engines
Set QS background color from System Accent
Force apps that support expanded notifications
Play sound and vibration for notifications when screen is on
Display text at bottom of QS panel
Set to empty for default ColtOS
Drag selection on the area you want to take as a screenshot
Customize screenshot attributes like time, delay,type etc
Hide smart replies to save screen space with peeking notifications
Hide the network traffic indicator arrows
Place indicator in either status bar or expanded header (recommended for displays with notch cutouts)
Display a warning at bottom of QS panel when network is monitored by external apps or vpn
Open quick settings when there are %1$s notifications
Open quick settings when there are no notifications
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Show heads up only for dialer or messaging app if they are not in foreground
Automatically turn on for these apps
Gaming mode will turn on automatically when these apps are opened and turn off when they are closed
Block all headsup messages except calls
Disable hardware buttons when Gaming mode is turned on
Lock screen brightness when Gaming mode is turned on
Try detecting and adding gaming apps automatically
Display left and right cursor buttons in navigation bar while typing
In order to add your own icon, select the top left icon and use the OnePlus 6T FP Customizer app to select the icon you want.
Shows an animation while reading your finger
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Use gradient color as a scale for the battery level

Only valid if 3-button navigation mode is used.
Whether to show R style notification headers (Requires a SystemUI restart)
Use the default values for your device
Configure notification light on per-app basis

Blink LED when battery level is low

Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory

Block screen and button inputs when device is in pocket

Icons/colors may vary depending on which device you are using.
Use wallpaper color for FOD icon
Uses adjusted primary wallpaper color for FOD icon\nNOTE: might look good only with some wallpapers
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
